name: 325 Card Game
description:
325 is a Single Player Card Game.

The 3 2 5 card game is very popular Game in India. You will also find this Card Game named 5 3 2  Or 2 3 5 card games. It can only be played between three players using 30 cards from the deck. The Card Game excludes cards below 8s and only includes the 7 of heart and 7 of spades. Here  the Rules of Game are as Same as The Normal 325 Game but the only difference is the players goals is to make as many as Hands Possible. The player whose make More number of Hand in 6 Rounds is will be the Winner.
